gen:link.msg:message: `MarketValue` reported with `ClassesOfTypesOfRealEstateAxis` and `TypesOfRealEstateMember` and `DAEBActivitiesMember` MUST be equal to `SocialRealEstateInExploitation` without `ClassesOfTypesOfRealEstateAxis` and `TypesOfRealEstateMember` and with `SeparateMember`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_MarketValueInRentedStateTotalDaebHousingDvi_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFST2FactNonExplicit1_Set01MarketValue')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_MarketValueInRentedStateTotalDaebHousingDvi_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFST2FactNonExplicit1_Set01MarketValue return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_MarketValueInRentedStateTotalDaebHousingDvi_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFST2FactNonExplicit1_Set02SocialRealEstateInExploitation')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_MarketValueInRentedStateTotalDaebHousingDvi_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFST2FactNonExplicit1_Set02SocialRealEstateInExploitation return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
